full_summary:
================================pipeline

### Vehicle Rentals for the Gaspésie Field Unit

**Request for Proposal**

The Parks Canada Agency invites eligible contractors to submit a bid for the provision of vehicle rentals for the Gaspésie Field Unit from April 22, 2024 to March 31, 2025, with an option to extend the contract for two additional one-year periods.

**Vehicle Requirements**

The Agency requires 37 vehicle rentals for a period of four to six months during the 2024, 2025 and 2026 operational season. The vehicles will be delivered at different times throughout the season, with the first rentals required on April 22, 2024.

**Contract Terms and Conditions**

The period of the contract shall be from the effective date of the contract to March 31, 2025, inclusive. The Contractor grants to the Agency the irrevocable option to extend the term of the contract by up to two additional one-year periods under the same conditions. The Contractor agrees to be paid in accordance with the applicable provisions as set out in the Basis of Payment during the extended period of the contract.

**Submission Procedure**

Bids must be submitted via fax or email, as specified in the solicitation document. Bids received in person or by courier will not be accepted. The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is [soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca). Bids submitted by email directly to the Contracting Authority or to any email address other than the specified one will not be accepted.

**Technical and Contractual Enquiries**

All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature must be submitted to the Contracting Authority.

**Additional Information**

The National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act. Bidders must obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at [http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Important Deadlines**
